Posts.Content: May 25, 2017 11:06AM JungChic wrote: Hi reneeromer, I wish there was some other way to go through things like this, but you will have to face it. And yes, it is okay to cry. It's one of the best ways to get relief from pain and depression. It also helps that you're an optimistic person and I congratulate you for that. Crossing my fingers and praying with you that you will get to spend lots of time with your grandchildren. :)
Posts.Title: Biopsy tomorrow... sick to my stomach reneeromer MTwoman
